post.text: We spent $6 trillion in the Middle East. We could have rebuilt our country twice!

comment.author: Hannah
comment.text: Stop letting her define the conversation! Hit her hard! Benghazi ! Stealing WH furniture ! Stealing from Haiti ! Clinton Foundation ! $$ From foreign countries ! Selling our uranium to Russia !

replies.author: Joseph
replies.text: Don't forget the drugs that Clintons bought into this country.

replies.author: Tayelor
replies.text: She had nothing to do with his coke use at the debate!!??

replies.author: Hannah
replies.text: Hey, Hellery, wipe that insipid grin off your face!
